Keywords: Brute , Celebrity , Exiles , Fantastic Four , Pirate
Real Name: Ben Grimm
Special Powers
IT'S RAIDIN' PARTY TIME!: During force construction, characters with [Dolphin symbol] gain the Pirate keyword. // Friendly characters with the Pirate keyword that occupy water terrain modify attack +1.
STONES OF MERLIN: Blackbeard may start the game with FFFF #s003 Stones of Merlin equipped. When he rolls for its EFFECT, increase the result by 1.
THEY'RE ONLY A DOZEN OF 'EM, I'VE GOT 'EM OUTNUMBERED!: Quake, Super Strength. When Blackbeard uses Quake, if he occupies water terrain, each hit character is dealt his printed damage instead of 2.
HAIL BLACKBEARD, SCOURGE OF THE SEVEN SEAS!: Empower, Leadership, Shape Change.
Trade Blackbeard Want Blackbeard

February 11, 2021
Goop
This is great, it gives you a chance to put all your dolphins on a single team and not have to worry about Atlantis keyword. He's a good figure with decent stats and powers. That massive quake he does can be deadly to certain teams. However he has no way to generate water so you really need to hit the map choice or run someone that can generate water like Susan of Atlantis.

February 5, 2021
machineman
Got to have this pirate! The original story of Ben Grimm getting thrown in the past as Blackbeard was one of the earliest FF stories I remember as a kid. Plus, adding any “dolphin” symbol characters to pirates will make for some water terrain shenanigans to ensure the damage bonus. The recent plethora of pirate KW clix has been excellent, especially since they can all be Spider-Fam! Wait, does names theme even matter any longer?
